text: Paweł Borkowski (born 7 June 1959) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Toruń
title: Paweł Borkowski
